page.title: 16Cable and Wireless
page.content: Several of the children who attend the St.Levan Primary School are from families employed by the Cable and Wireless Company at Porthcurno.The beaches from Sennen Cove around to Porthcurno have seen more telephone and telegraph cable landings than any other area in the world.At one time, between the wars,all overseas tele- graph traffic circulating to and from London over the Commonwealth cable system passed through Porthcurno amou- nting to some two million words per day.Commercial telegraph operations ceased at Porthcurno in 1970.However Cable and Wireless happily maintains an extensive technical training coll- ege here which forms part of the local social and sporting scene.Cable oper- ators and engineers from all over the world have trained here.
